headline: ServiceNow’s (NOW) Growth Forecasts Improve — Analysts Say More Upside Ahead
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight This Week. On October 30, Wells Fargo analyst Michael Turrin raised the price target on the stock to $1,275.00 from $1,225.00 while maintaining an Overweight rating driven by the company’s higher FY25-26 outlook. The firm believes that ServiceNow is one of the best growth […]

headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Net Margin Rises to 13.7%, Reinforcing Bullish Growth Narratives
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) reported another quarter of rapid growth, with revenue rising 15.4% per year, easily outpacing the broader US market’s 10.3% rate. EPS is projected to expand by 22.1% per year as well, and net profit margin improved to 13.7% from last year’s 12.8%, signaling healthier profitability. With analysts pointing to continued strong profit and revenue momentum, investors will be weighing the company’s elevated valuation against its market-beating growth potential. See our full...

headline: 2 Growth Stocks with Explosive Upside and 1 We Brush Off
summary: Growth is a hallmark of all great companies, but the laws of gravity eventually take hold. Those who rode the COVID boom and ensuing tech selloff in 2022 will surely remember that the market’s punishment can be swift and severe when trajectories fall.
